duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure OSHA and security policy compliance within the facility, including adherence to strict confidentiality and recordkeeping.
Investigate workplace accidents and injuries to determine root cause analysis.
Conduct various safety-related training, including orientations, as well as powered equipment safety training.
Maintain building alarms, badge access systems, and CCTV surveillance equipment.
Conduct internal theft investigations and interviews.
Audit and maintain facility Emergency Action Plans.
Act as a first responder to on-the-job workplace incidents.
Act as a liaison for several 3rd party vendors such as contract security, supply vendors, alarm and CCTV vendors.
Create, track, receive, and reconcile purchase orders.
Provide supervision, coaching, and development for direct reports, as well as writing and conducting annual performance appraisals.
Participate in the interview and selection process of new LP & Safety team members.
Partner with various members of the HR team to assist with employee relation issues related to safety and/or security.
Work with various internal teams to ensure adherence to security guidelines and regulations.
Other duties as assigned by Safety Manager.
